column5: Air Tamarac will be offering a new lake next season: Lake Ang√®le. They just finish building a new camp and the 1st group to go in was going for moose hunting. They kill their moose the 1st day so they had some time to fish a little. The lake is promsing regarding pike fishing. See pics
Thanks for the update, Andre. Jean flew us out on our June trip to Sand lake. I'll be seeing Air Tamarac at the Harrisburg show and will be looking forward to discussing the new lake. Ron
